title: Human Resource Management Issues for Print and Digital Media
description: Human resource management integrated into the success of graphic communication companies. A comprehensive management approach is utilized emphasizing employee development, training, promotion, and motivation. Conflict management, facilitation skills, team building empowerment, leadership, ethical and legal issues in the graphic communication industry. 3 lectures, 1 laboratory.
prerequisites: GRC 403 and senior standing; Graphic Communication majors only
